projects.name: Password manager
projects.description: A full-stack app which allows the user to log in and store passwords from various accounts. The front-end was done with Next.js and the back-end API was done with Express. A MongoDB database is used to store encrypted versions of the user's passwords.

projects.name: Dictionary
projects.description: An online dictionary developed using React. The dictionary uses an existing API from 'dictionaryapi.dev'. The data is getting fetched using 'GET' requests, and it is in JSON format. Once received, the data is reorganized and dynamically rendered to the user.

projects.name: Sliding-puzzle solver
projects.description: A program which can solve slider-puzzles of all dimensions. The program is written in Java and accepts a text file containing the current state of the puzzle you are trying to solve. Using the A* algorithm and priority queues, the program is able to calculate the smallest amount of moves necessary to solve the puzzle. The process of solving is then printed out to the console step by step.
